abstract: New York Mets third baseman David Wright, who was sidelined in 2014 after jamming his shoulder in headfirst slide, is taking steps to avoid injury as team is counting on his abilities in coming season.
lead_paragraph: The Mets are hoping, finally, to contend. Those expectations rest on Wright, whose 2014 season was derailed by a shoulder injury but who seems more aware of his physical limitations.

headline.main: David Wright Aims to Raise His Production, Along With His Number of Games Played
headline.print_headline: Wright Aims to Raise His Production, Along With His Number of Games Played
